name: Cool Cat's Good Time Drug Free Video Game
name_original: Cool Cat's Good Time Drug Free Video Game
description:
In 1987, the US Department of Not Doing Drugs released "Cool Cat's Good

Time Drug Free Video Game" to help kids learn how to be cool. You are
on your way to join Cool Cat's Cool Club, but beware! Along your path
you'll encounter lots of sneaky characters who would love to tempt you
into illicit activities! In this game, you'll have fun and maybe learn a
little something about how to be cool in a safe and secure way!
